overview: Kadu Mark, a bright and smart student joins University under pressure from his father, Mr Anatoli, a prominent city lawyer who is overjoyed that Mark has managed to be offered a law course and is soon to become a lawyer like himself. However, at the back of Mark's mind, he is disgusted with the whole "Law" course idea because he wants to lead a different career. When Mr Anatoli finds out that Mark has quietly changed the course, will he sue him?
title: Breaking the Mesh
